akn:section.akn:heading: Printing and distribution of decennial editions and supplements to Constitution Annotated

akn:content.akn:p: § 168c. Printing and distribution of decennial editions and supplements to Constitution Annotated Additional copies of each hardbound decennial revised edition and of the cumulative pocket-part supplements thereto shall be printed and distributed in accordance with the provisions of any concurrent resolution hereafter adopted with respect thereto. (Pub. L. 91–589, § 4, Dec. 24, 1970, 84 Stat. 1587.)
